```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(lme4)
library(Matrix)
library(lmerTest)
library(MuMIn)
```


```{r}
data<-read.csv("walmart.csv")
```

### Null model

```{r}
null_model <- lm(Weekly_Sales ~ 1, data = data)
print(null_model)
summary(null_model)
residuals <- residuals(null_model)
mse <- mean(residuals^2)
print(mse)
```

### multilevel model

```{r}
model1 <- lmer(Weekly_Sales ~ 1 + (1 | Store), data = data)
summary(model1)
```

```{r}
plot(residuals(model1))
hist(residuals(model1))
```
